General.Name: Pan Malaysia Corporation Bhd
General.Description: Pan Malaysia Corporation Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacturing, marketing, and distribution of chocolate and confectionery products in Malaysia and rest of Asia. The company is also involved in the warehousing and distribution of chilled and confectionery products, and snack foods, as well as marketing and distribution of beverage products. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1963 and is based in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
